function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Transfer of the agent-based model to other contexts without corresponding data may lead to inaccurate predictions and recommendations.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible covid-19 spreading due to lack of social isolation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective control of the disease with low isolation rates","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focus on the mathematical modeling for risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assessment of economic effects of different social-distancing scenarios","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on government enforcement of social isolation measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Modeling the economy within the agent-based model may introduce biases or oversimplifications that impact the accuracy of economic impact estimations.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on a specific programming language and package for the agent-based model may limit accessibility and collaboration, leading to a lack of diverse perspectives and expertise in the development and validation process.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Modeling and simulating the covid-19 epidemic using equation-based or agent-based models","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Developing an agent-based model abm to simulate the dynamics of the covid-19 epidemic","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emulating a
